title: Maayan Zohar Basteker Articles | Similarweb
description: Read articles by Maayan Zohar Basteker, a senior SEO specialist at Similarweb. She writes on everything you want to know about SEO optimization & strategy.
content: HomeBlogMaayan Zohar Basteker Senior SEO Specialist at Similarweb Maayan Zohar Basteker Maayan is a senior SEO specialist with 5+ years of experience in SEO. She started her digital marketing career doing PPC and Media planning, but found out SEO is her true passion. Maayan loves complex research projects, creating SEO strategies and performing technical audits for websites. Before coming to Similarweb Maayan worked at the leading digital marketing agency in Israel, doing SEO for big brands & international sites.
